EmailTemplate.name: CAB Survey Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, a quick note from MBO Partners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
Research is the strongest tool we have to grow awareness around America’s independent movement. That’s why MBO Partners is teaming up with the Career Advisory Board (CAB) to conduct a short, 10 question survey <https://mbopartners.co1.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_0Bdwv1X6ccVMMkd> to better understand the skills and personal attributes needed to be a successful independent contractor or consultant.
Here’s where you come in – if you can help us by taking our 5 minute survey here <https://mbopartners.co1.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_0Bdwv1X6ccVMMkd>, we will enter you to win a 16GB Apple iPad.
Your responses will be used by the CAB to provide advice and counsel to students, young adults and others who are considering a career as an independent professional.
We appreciate you taking the time to give back. As an experienced and successful independent professional, your input will be a valuable asset to those starting on this path.
Thank you in advance for your help. ___________________________________ Gene Zaino President and CEO MBO Partners
e: communications@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
